Text: I NEED HELP! I DONT HAVE BLUERAY DRIVE AND I WANT TO WATCH BR-RIP MOVIES LIKE THIS ONE. I HAVE WINDOWS MEDIA! TELL ME IF I CAN PLEASE!!

iGabriel

use VLC media player (free to download from: http://www.videolan.org/vlc/  )
It can play virtually any video files.

@Brando89: Watch it and see. The preview looked intriguing. 
@iGabriel88: If VLC doesn't work, which is should, you can also use uPlayer.

@iGabriel88 - Google CCCP - Combined Community Codec Pack - It has all the codex you need to play various rips within Windows Media Player. - The player is not your problem... its that you dont have the codecs you need! :)
Hope this helps!
